attributes.action: Get paid for not being allowed to work during COVID 19
attributes.additional_details: Many workers on lower incomes who are self employed have been excluded from a furlough payment because of government loopholes
attributes.background: Pay those self employed workers who have fallen through the loop and not been awarded a furlough payment during COVID 19

rejection.details:
We understand that you'd like a change to the support available for self employed workers, but we're not exactly sure what you'd like that change to be. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like to happen. For example, explaining what current eligibility criteria you'd like changed. 

We've published these petitions about support for the self employed which you may wish to sign: 

Remove the 50% Self Employed Rule for those with a P45 dated before UK Lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552425

Change the way The Self employed income support grants are calculated: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326422

Remove the £50,000 cap and extend the tax return deadline for the SEISS: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551833

One-off Grant To Be Paid To Anyone Who Has Not Benefited From A Covid-19 Scheme: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319899
